title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin reacts to the huge news in the NFL with Raiders head coach Jon Gruden announcing his resignation after emails were discovered with Gruden using hateful, racist and misogynistic language. He points out that it’s time for people to admit they were wrong about Lamar Jackson after his remarkable come from behind win over the Colts on Monday Night Football. He reveals his Herd Hierarchy of top 10 teams in the NFL after week 5. Plus, NFL Network analyst Daniel Jeremiah joins the show to tell Colin what he saw from Baker Mayfield in his loss to the Chargers and why the Colts are struggling so much this season.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
